replies.body:
Want to learn the possibilities of different formatting on boards? check out this markdown cheat sheet - https://github.com/adam-p/markdown-here/wiki/Markdown-Cheatsheet
# testing
## Markdown
### language
#### cheat sheet
##### trying all the markdown formatting options

Emphasis, aka italics, with *asterisks*

Strikethrough uses two tildes. ~~Scratch this.~~

Lists ordered

1. First ordered list item
2. Another item

and unordered

* Unordered list can use asterisks
- Or minuses
+ Or pluses


| Tables        | Are           | Cool  |
| ------------- |:-------------:| -----:|
| I    | love | tables |
| so    | very    |   very |
| very | very   |    much |
I cannot stand learning to program, it is such a long winded drudgery
Check out the cheat sheet mark down is super easy.
Now you are making me feel bad, that was my comment after reading the mark down :(

Oh....haha sorry!

All you have to do is put # or * infront and/or behind the words you want to change. hope that helps.

Also don't forget all the {{champion:119}} champions icons, {{item:3512}} item icons, {{summoner:14}} summoner spell icons and these:

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
